meanings.sent1: She became chattier after drinking a cup of coffee.
meanings.sent2: The parrot was chattier than the quiet cat.
meanings.sent3: The chattier squirrel chattered away happily in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her chattier nature was like a bubbling brook, always flowing with words.
meanings.sent5: The chattier child in the class was like a little chatterbox, never staying silent for long.

meanings.sent1: Today, Sarah was chattier than she had ever been before.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends grew chattier as the night went on.
meanings.sent3: The chattier dog barked excitedly at every passing car.
meanings.sent4: His chattier mood was like a sunny day after a week of rain.
meanings.sent5: The chattier birds sang a lively tune in the morning, waking up the whole neighborhood.
